rightSubheader: Web Developer - UI/UX Designer - Growth Hacker
rightText: I have been in the startup space for the last 4 years. During that time, I have been involved in a wide variety of functional areas which include marketing, UI/UX design, web analytics, growth hacking. I am also a full stack web developer with a focus in RoR and AngularJS. I am currently working as a freelance consultant helping companies adjust feature sets and improve the UI/UX experience of their products. I am also currently working on a two music projects.
rightSubheader: For more information, please visit the sections below.
